newsitem.title: USA: MBIA qualifies three issues for bond insurance.
newsitem.headline: MBIA qualifies three issues for bond insurance.

text.p: MBIA Insurance Corp said it has qualified for bond insurance the following three municipal issues scheduled for competitive sale today.
--Charles Stewart Col., Mich., $6.025 million general obligation improvement bonds.
--New Hope-Solebury S.D., Pa., $22.515 million GOs under the alternative bidding program.
--Harris County MUD #345, Texas, $2.49 million GO bonds.
